text: @seanhannity Today more than ever there's plenty of people who need to pay attention not only to the coronavirus but to their mental health. People now days are very aggresive/crazy, they need to pay a visit to a psychiatrist, is the only way to get medication for unfulfilled mental attitude

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
